source_objects.title: Leadership
source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.

items.title: Succeed, Influence and Inspire as a Woman in Leadership
items.headline: Earn Respect, Manage Politics & Negative Comments to Become a Strong & Influential Female Leader!
objectives_summary: Develop a progressive work environment
Earn the respect of those you lead
Handle and manage the stereotypes around women in leadership positions

items.title: Leadership Lessons and Building high performing teams
items.headline: Lessons in Leadership
objectives_summary: How to become a better Leader and build long term high performing teams

items.title: Enhance your Emotional Intelligence; The Science of Emotions

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)

items.headline: The Science, Research and Lessons, on Emotions, and Social Skills, for Leaders, Managers & everyone else!
objectives_summary: Understand what Emotions are, their function and how they work.
Learn about the Research behind several key Emotions, and how they affect your Judgements and Decisions!
Use this Research to learn some Strategies and Techniques to manage your Emotions better, and prevent them from jeopardizing your Judgements and Decisions!

items.title: Managing conflict with skill and confidence

visible_instructors.name: Barry
visible_instructors.job_title: Peronal development training for life and career
visible_instructors.title: Barry Winbolt

items.headline: Understanding conflict and resolving disagreements with confidence at work and in life
objectives_summary: Students will be able to manage conflict situations more effectively and deal with anger and strong emotional responses in a constructive way.
The vital keys to preventing escalation and dispute.
How to turn potential flare-ups into constructive conversations.

items.title: Leadership Ethics and Integrity: A Comprehensive Guide !

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)

items.headline: Deep and Enlightening Insights, and Lessons, from the Research on Integrity, Ethics and Morality, for today's Leaders !
objectives_summary: Understand the evolution and functions, of Integrity, Ethics and Moral behaviour.
Learn some valuable Lessons and Strategies, to improve the Culture, Integrity and Ethics of your Organization's employees and Leaders.
Understand the benefits of creating an Ethical Corporate Culture.

items.title: Public Speaking: A tactical approach

visible_instructors.name: Ivan
visible_instructors.job_title: I'm on a mission to end boring!
visible_instructors.title: Ivan Wanis Ruiz

items.headline: This course will teach public speaking, communication skills and storytelling in an entirely new way.
objectives_summary: Communication tactics to make public speaking and one-on-one communication more effective
How to create an effective opening statement based on Neuroscience

items.title: How to Use Leadership Styles Effectively: Matched Leadership
items.headline: Learn to lead more effectively by properly matching your leadership style to the competence level of your team member
objectives_summary: Lead more effectively by matching your leadership style to the competence of your follower
Understand the four different competence levels and how they affect your leadership
Understand the need for four different leadership styles and how to use them effectively

items.title: Leadership: Essentials for Career Development

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Leader and Special Forces Veteran
visible_instructors.title: Andrew LeMasters

items.headline: Learn to manage and lead with diversity
objectives_summary: You will learn the skill sets necessary to lead at all levels and excel in your career.

items.title: A Diversity Deep-Dive, Leadership Insights and Lessons !

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)

items.headline: The Research and Evidence, on Diversity and Inclusion; Insights, Lessons, and Strategies, for Leaders and Managers.
objectives_summary: Understand the Research done on the different aspects of Ethnic and Gender Diversity
Learn about whether Diversity has Business and other benefits, and if so what they are.
Understand why it is hard for people to accept Diversity, and how we can overcome these obstacles.

items.title: Roadmap to Leadership

visible_instructors.job_title: HR Vice Empress / CEO of The Galatas Group
visible_instructors.name: Donna
visible_instructors.title: Donna Galatas

items.headline: Your step-by-step guide to become a leader your team, your peers and your mentors admire and respect.
objectives_summary: Identify 7 leadership styles
Determine your leadership style(s)
Assess your team's level of readiness for achieving goals and how to adjust your leadership style

items.title: Charisma: You Can Develop Charisma
items.headline: Charisma - You can learn to speak like a Charismatic leader
objectives_summary: Project charisma
Speak confidently and be described as having charisma
Convey leadership

items.title: The Soul of Leadership with Deepak Chopra
items.headline: Unlock Your Potential for Greatness and Become the Empowered, Creative Leader You Were Always Meant to Be
objectives_summary: Discover the 7 Qualities Every Great Leader Possesses
Master the Techniques that Set Great Leaders Apart
Uncover Why Managing Doesn’t Work, But Empowering Does

items.title: Fully Accredited Professional Spirituality Coach Diploma
items.headline: Fully Accredited Diploma Course - Powerful tools to help yourself or your clients as a Professional Spirituality Coach.
objectives_summary: Think & Become Beyond A Life Coach To A Spirituality Coach
Understand What Is A Spirituality Coach
Know About Waking Up To The Spiritual Journey

items.title: Leading Effective Meetings - You Can Lead Effective Meetings
items.headline: Learn How to Plan Effective Meetings, Run Effective Meetings and Generate Results After Your Meetings
objectives_summary: Become highly skilled in leading effective meetings
How to Plan effective meetings
How to conduct effective meetings

items.title: Upgrade your Influencing and Negotiation Skills !

visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Business Leader, Academic, and Research Scholar
visible_instructors.name: Sivakami
visible_instructors.title: Sivakami S ; MBA ; Ph.D (ongoing)

items.headline: Research based Insights, Strategies and Techniques, on Negotiation, Influencing and Persuasion Skills!
objectives_summary: Improve your Negotiation Skills with knowledge of a few key concepts in Psychology and Behavioral Science/Economics.
Become better Influencers and minimize getting influenced by learning relevant concepts in Psychology and Behavioral Economics.
Guard against manipulations from others during negotiations and decision-making.

items.title: Speak Up! Public Speaking for Leadership Development
items.headline: Master your communication toolkit, learn to speak up, harness your mindset, and be taken seriously at work and in life.
objectives_summary: Step up to your leadership potential through mastering the tools of high-level communication.
Let go of your inner critic and feel the power of owning your winning mindset.
Decrease anxiety and increase confidence and authority in any public speaking situation.
